    • Method Detail

      • getProperty

        public Object getProperty(String name)
        Searches for the property with the specified key in the property list. The method returns null if the property is not found or the key explicitly maps to null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property.

      • getProperties

        public Map<String,Object> getProperties()
        Returns the property map.
        Returns:
        A map of the properties.

      • setProperty

        public Object setProperty(String name,
                          Object value)
        Sets a property with the specified key and value in the property list. The method returns the result of the put operation to the property map. Property values should match the expected type listed, such as Integer and Boolean properties.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property.
        value - The value of the property.
        Returns:
        The result of the put operation.

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(Map<String,Object> properties)
        Bulk set of properties, invokes the HashMap.putAll(Map) method which copies entries from the provided map to the property map. This overwrites existing properties with the same names.
        Parameters:
        properties - The map from which to copy properties.

      • getIntegerProperty

        public Integer getIntegerProperty(String name)
        Searches for the property with the specified key in the property list and converts to Integer. The method returns null if the property is not found, was not an Integer, or the key explicitly maps to null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property.
        Returns:
        The result of the get operation or null.

      • getBooleanProperty

        public Boolean getBooleanProperty(String name)
        Searches for the property with the specified key in the property list and converts to Boolean. The method returns null if the property is not found, was not a Boolean, or the key explicitly maps to null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property.
        Returns:
        The result of the get operation. (or null if the property is not found, was not a Boolean, or the key explicitly maps to null).

      • getStringProperty

        public String getStringProperty(String name)
        Searches for the property with the specified key in the property list and converts to String. The method returns null if the property is not found, was not a String, or the key explicitly maps to null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property.
        Returns:
        The result of the get operation or null.

      • setIntegerProperty

        public Object setIntegerProperty(String name,
                                 int value)
        Sets a property with the specified key and value in the property list, wrapping the value as an Integer. The method returns the result of the put operation to the property map.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property.
        value - The value of the property.
        Returns:
        The result of the put operation.

      • setBooleanProperty

        public Object setBooleanProperty(String name,
                                 boolean value)
        Sets a property with the specified key and value in the property list, wrapping the value as a Boolean. The method returns the result of the put operation to the property map.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property.
        value - The value of the property.
        Returns:
        The result of the put operation.

      • propertyNames

        public Set<String> propertyNames()
        Gets the set of property names (keys) currently in the property map.
        Returns:
        The set of property names from the property map.
